short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seekbar for skipping to custom time on youtube shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple seekbar for skipping to a custom time on shorts. By default youtube does not allows user to rewind shorts on web, for some reason that feature is only enabled in mobile applications. This extension allows you to do exactly that.
